title: Star Trek New Voyages To Serve All My Days 720p Rifftrax 2ch
description:
Star.Trek.New.Voyages.s01e02.2006.To.Serve.All.My.Days.720p.Rifftrax.2ch.mkv

DEFAULT AUDIO IS TRACK1 EPISODE PLUS RIFFTRAX
FOR EPISODE ONLY SOUND SWITCH TO TRACK2 FOR 2.0 WITH NO COMMENTARY

Star Trek New Voyages: Phase II S01E02 To Serve All My Days featuring Chekov
video: 1280x720 AVC 1017kbps
audio1 (default): movie plus Rifftrax AAC 2.0 128kbps

built in subs, off by default: English UTF-8 Plain Text
Riffers: Kevin Murphy, Bill Corbett
1h02m24s 665,343,245bytes custom named chapters
2008.05.28 Rifftrax
2006.11.23 Episode Release
  http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0910482/  

Please note: the 720p source for the trailer at the end is slightly different than the low-def trailer that they originally riffed. The original trailer has a quick shot of Chekov who just died in the main episode they riffed so they express outrage but the 720p trailer doesn't show Chekov. Also, the credits were repeated so there's video while the riffers do the intro for the episode.

This is a remux with the Rifftrax commentary added as the default audio track. The Rifftrax audio track has been newly remastered to ensure the riff comments are just loud enough to be clear when the movie is loud and not too loud when the movie is quiet. Please leave any feedback regarding the Rifftrax audio remastering.
